name: ZenyaConcierge
0:
”Alexa ask zenya concierge where is the fitness center”
”Alexa ask zenya concierge about the swimming pool”
”Alexa ask zenya concierge to bring chocolate to my room”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: zenya concierge
des: This skill is being used together with the Zenya Software. Configure your device for a specific room, then your guests can ask about specific hotel information, order items and more.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
